Header.title: teamee
Header.paragraph: “Join the team” With the “teamee” app you can make new friends to do your favourite sports!

About.paragraph: We are a tech start-up connecting people to share their interest in doing sports together.

Features.title: Ad-free Experience
Features.text: Our application is an ad-free experience to all of our users

Features.title: Intuitive Interface
Features.text: To simply "join the team" is not just our mission, it is our passion and purpose to simplify the process of finding your training partner(s)

Features.title: Join/Create the Team
Features.text: Users can either create and host their own activity, or search and join an existing one!

Features.title: Health Tracker
Features.text: Leverage your training experience with an all-new health tracker and mission dashboard
